Types of cloud: There are three types of computing, They are, ● Private Cloud ● Public Cloud ● Hybrid Cloud
The private cloud is defined as computing services offered either over the internet or a private internet network and only to selected users instead of the general public. Private Cloud:
Public Cloud: The public cloud is defined as computing services offered by third party providers over the public internet.
Hybrid Cloud: A combination of public and private cloud is called Hybrid cloud.
